doc.after: Doom Bar is a bitter (4.0% abv) brewed by Sharp's Brewery at Rock, a village on the estuary opposite Padstow. It is the brewery's flagship beer, accounting for 90 per cent of sales and with an output of 24,000,000 imperial pints (14,000Â kl) in 2010.[64] In 2011, sales increased by 22 per cent, making it the UK's fastest growing ale for three years in a row.[65] As of June 2013, Doom Bar bitter became the number one UK cask ale, by volume and value.[66]
